text: HBO Max’s new TV and movie release schedule for June 30 to July 6, 2025, includes Annabelle (2014), Valley of the Sun (1942), and Sinners. On July 1, the horror drama Annabelle (2014) drops on HBO Max. It revolves around John and Mia, who face attacks from a satanic cult using a doll to make their lives miserable. Thus begins a series of unusual events threatening everyone’s lives. Further, Valley of the Sun (1942) will be available on the streaming platform on the same day. The western movie showcases an Army scout being betrayed by a government agent. However, he runs away from the jail and decides to stop an Indian massacre in Washington, DC. Also coming to the platform this week is the much-awaited horror thriller, Sinners. It focuses on twin brothers trying to restart their lives in their hometown. However, their peace is short-lived, and they must prepare to face an evil like never before. New HBO Max releases for June 30-July 6, 2025 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to HBO Max from June 30 to July 6, 2025. html:
HBO Max’s new TV and movie release schedule for June 30 to July 6, 2025, includes Annabelle (2014), Valley of the Sun (1942), and Sinners.

On July 1, the horror drama Annabelle (2014) drops on HBO Max. It revolves around John and Mia, who face attacks from a satanic cult using a doll to make their lives miserable. Thus begins a series of unusual events threatening everyone’s lives.

Further, Valley of the Sun (1942) will be available on the streaming platform on the same day. The western movie showcases an Army scout being betrayed by a government agent. However, he runs away from the jail and decides to stop an Indian massacre in Washington, DC.

Also coming to the platform this week is the much-awaited horror thriller, Sinners. It focuses on twin brothers trying to restart their lives in their hometown. However, their peace is short-lived, and they must prepare to face an evil like never before.

New HBO Max releases for June 30-July 6, 2025

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to HBO Max from June 30 to July 6, 2025.

Monday, June 30

  • 90 Day Fiancé: Pillow Talk, Season 11 (TLC)
  • Truck U, Season 21

Tuesday, July 1

  • Annabelle (2014)
  • Better off Dead…
  • Big Star: Nothing Can Hurt Me
  • Canyon River

For more HBO Max content, check out an exciting update from J.K. Rowling on the upcoming Harry Potter TV show.
